stories.text:
Hello HN!

Here is a little game I made, colorful tiles must be placed next to other tiles and match in symbol or color. This game is inspired by Passage 3 and similar games like Qwirkle, Rummy or Dominoes. There exist some browser-based versions here and there, but I wasn't completely satisfied with any of them, so I made my own. This is optimized for a broad range of screen sizes and auto-rotates the playing field for narrow (portrait) viewports. As I've discovered with my own parents, folks who enjoy playing Solitaire, Hearts and similar games might enjoy this as well, so gladly spread the word.

Have fun and feedback is appreciated! :)
stories.title: Show HN: ColorTiles Browser Game

stories.text:
Would you invest or use AI produced content, that promises SEO benefits and visibility?

Have you used it, does it work for you? Is the spend of subscription benefial and gives the lift and viewership?

We hear a lot from successful content writers, influencers, industry experts and leadership that authentic and genuine content is better as it connects with your TAM. you thoughts?

What softwares might you suggest if you have used and see value.
stories.title: Ask HN: AI produced content what is your take?
